title: b.tan Spray Tan Solution | Love At First Tan - Pro Spray Mist, Violet Based Sunless Airbrush Tanning Solution for a Fast Rich Dark Tan - Use with Spray Tan Machine, Spray Tan Tents, 33.8 fl oz
features: no, it’s not going to turn you purple. it’s a violet based tan, and it’s going to give you a dark tan you won't soon forget... my violet base knocks out orange tones, making me perfect for first-time tanners and those who want no orange in their tan game.

first up, get naked. or at least naked enough to tan your super hot bod. make sure your skin is clean, exfoliated and dry. apply professional solution with your spray tan machine evenly and smoothly. rinse in one hour for a deep tan, or go crazy dark and leave it on for 4+ hours.
i'm 100% vegan, free of nasties like parabens and i love animals so am 100% cruelty free
